title: Prince

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Open your church at night.
- Allow your vote to count as two during the day. Have one more charge of this ability when the Paragon awakens.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you open your church and are attacked, you will deal a basic attack to the visitors. If you are killed while your church is open, you will gain 2 Faith Points.
- You learn the roles of all your visitors while your church is open.
- All visitors to your church while it is open will net you 1 Faith Point.
- When you have accumulated 2 Faith points, The Saint will gain a Saint point.
- There will be no indication that your vote was two, other than the vote count appearing to be wrong. You may only make your vote count once per day, and you cannot reactivate it if you switch who youâ€™re voting.
- If the player you increased your voting power against is lynched, gain a Faith point.
- You may open your church three times. Lose a charge when the Paragon awakens.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You attacked someone who visited your Church last night!"
"They were stabbed by the Prince."
